00026 #include "chipstream/QuantBirdseedLegacy.h"
00027 
00028 QuantBirdseedLegacy::~QuantBirdseedLegacy() {};
00029 
00030 /** Constructor, currently creates prior estimates from pre-calculated data from R. */
00031 QuantBirdseedLegacy::QuantBirdseedLegacy(double confidenceThreshold, double correctionFactor) :
00032     QuantBirdseedv1(confidenceThreshold, correctionFactor)
00033 {
00034   setupSelfDoc(*this);
00035 }
00036 
00037 /** Fill in our self documentation from current state. */
00038 void QuantBirdseedLegacy::setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc)
00039 {
00040   doc.setDocName(QUANTBIRDSEEDLEGACY);
00041   doc.setDocDescription("Do genotyping calls using the Birdseed v1 algorithm. Legacy alias to birdseed-v1 method. You should use birdseed-v1 rather than birdseed.");
00042   doc.setDocOptions(getDefaultDocOptions());
00043 }
00044 
00045 /**
00046  * @brief What is the name of the quantification method?
00047  * @return name of adjuster.
00048  */
00049 std::string QuantBirdseedLegacy::getType()
00050 {
00051   return std::string(QUANTBIRDSEEDLEGACY);
00052 }
00053 
00054 SelfCreate * QuantBirdseedLegacy::newObject(std::map<std::string, std::string> &param)
00055 {
00056   SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00057   double confThreshold;
00058   fillInValue(confThreshold, "conf-threshold", param, doc);
00059   double correctionFactor;
00060   fillInValue(correctionFactor, "correction-factor", param, doc);
00061   birdseed::v1::setSelfDocOptions(&doc, param);
00062   QuantBirdseedLegacy *obj = new QuantBirdseedLegacy(confThreshold, correctionFactor);
00063 
00064   /// @todo hack to get the self doc correctly set with user supplied values
00065   /// this should really go in the constructor
00066   birdseed::v1::setSelfDocOptions(obj, param);
00067   return obj;
00068 }
00069 
00070 SelfDoc QuantBirdseedLegacy::explainSelf()
00071 {
00072   SelfDoc doc;
00073   setupSelfDoc(doc);
00074   return doc;
00075 }
